eventParts.text: Look, there are some birds up ahead!
They look to be in pretty bad shape.
Hello there, are you birds alright?
Oh thank the winds, some friendly birds!
We’ve been traveling ever since the vultures came through our village..
They stole our seeds and wrecked our homes, and now we’re trying to find a new place to settle.
Please, do you have any spare seeds? We’re almost out of food.
The vultures stole our seeds too, and we’re trying to get them back. I don’t think any of us has any spare seeds. Do we?

I have a few, actually. But I - My mom gave them to me before I set out on this journey. She said I had to hold onto them and that they would be the first investment in the shop when I get back. And I..

eventConsequence.selectionText: Rebecca, these birds don’t have much else to eat. I know your mom gave you those seeds, but I think these birds need them more.
eventConsequence.conclusionText:
Okay. I miss my mom, but I think she would want these birds to have the seeds. Here you go.

Rebecca gains +3 loneliness!

eventConsequence.selectionText: Those seeds mean a lot to you, huh? I don’t think you should have to give them away. I’m sure we can help these birds find food some other way.
eventConsequence.conclusionText:
Thank you for understanding! I’d be happy to help you birds find food for your journey!

Rebecca gains +2 friendliness!
